About this site

This website is created with the purpose of detailing the "destinations" in the voyage of ISSS608 - Visual Analytics and Applications module, part of the SMU MITB programme, AY2023-24.

Many thanks to ship captain, Prof. Kam Tin Seong, is navigating us through the world of Visual Analytics.
